text: This section contains step-by-step procedures describing the basic system administration tasks. The procedures and commands described expect that the $MZ_HOME/bin directory exists in the $PATH variable for the mzadmin user. After a properly executed installation, this should be the case. This chapter includes the following sections: File System Permissions Remote Access to Containers Starting and Stopping the System Managing Picos System Properties Desktop Properties Legacy Desktop Properties Clearing the Pico Cache Resetting the mzadmin Password Changing Database Password Increasing the Maximum Number of File Descriptors Out of Memory Info in System Log Access Controller Extensions Reading the License File
title: Basic Administration - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
